title: Mirrored Fates
outcome: The Halden Echoes oracle surprises the city by revealing alternate histories for every citizen—paths their lives might have followed under different scores or choices. Stenograd erupts in nightly story gatherings and public confessions. Council members, exposed to the ramifications of their past manipulations, must participate directly in city-wide truth and reconciliation broadcasts. The city begins to heal not only through knowledge of the past, but through understanding of what might have been.

events.description: The Halden Echoes oracle broadcasts personalized visions of alternative life paths to every resident, sparking astonishment and intense discussion across Stenograd.
Community circles form each night, with citizens sharing and comparing their alternate pasts. The movement swells, weaving new relationships and dissolving old divisions.
The Council, including Rada, Daria, and Oksana, participate in an unprecedented live broadcast where they disclose their own alternate history visions and admit to past manipulations.
Stenograd holds a citywide day of reconciliation, encouraging citizens to forgive and seek understanding, guided by the counterfactual revelations of the oracle.
The BCI’s influence is formally diminished as citizens vote for participatory justice—new rules for public accountability and oversight are debated openly, marking a turning point in governance.
